description:
Gravel riding is incredibly fun, but flat tires, not so much. This tube is the answer for 650B wheels. Slide it in a jersey pocket, or handlebar bag and roll with confidence.

  • For 650B road bike tires with 37 to 44mm width
  • Compatible with MEC Provincial Trail bike
  • Made with high-quality butyl rubber
  • 42mm presta valve
name: Continental 650B x 37-44 Tour 26 Tube (42mm Presta Valve)
